name: SpongeBob
overview: Harry James Potter is the main protagonist in J.K. Rowling's Harry Potter series. He is a young wizard known for his distinctive lightning-shaped scar on his forehead, which he received as a baby when the dark wizard Voldemort tried to kill him. The spell intended to end Harry's life backfired, making Harry the only known survivor of the Killing Curse. This event also marked him as 'The Boy Who Lived.'
loyalty: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry

name: Patrick
overview: Hermione Granger is one of the central characters in J.K. Rowling's Harry Potter series. She is a highly intelligent and resourceful witch, known for her academic excellence and strong moral compass. Born to non-magical (Muggle) parents, Hermione discovers her magical abilities and attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, where she becomes best friends with Harry Potter and Ron Weasley.
loyalty: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry

name: Sandy
overview: Ron Weasley is one of the main characters in J.K. Rowling's Harry Potter series and a close friend of Harry Potter and Hermione Granger. He comes from a large, loving, but financially struggling wizarding family, the Weasleys. Ron is the sixth of seven children and often feels overshadowed by his successful older brothers.
loyalty: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry

name: Mr. Krabs
overview: Draco Lucius Malfoy was a British pure-blood wizard and the only son of Lucius and Narcissa Malfoy. The son of a Death Eater, Draco was raised to strongly believe in the importance of blood purity. He looked down on half-bloods and Muggle-borns.
loyalty: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry

name: Squidward
overview: Professor Minerva McGonagall, was a Scottish half-blood witch, the only daughter of Muggle Robert McGonagall and witch Isobel Ross. She also was the older sister of Malcolm and Robert Jnr. Minerva attended Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry and was Sorted into Gryffindor House, but it took the Sorting Hat five and a half minutes to decide if she was Gryffindor or Ravenclaw, which made her a Hatstall. During her seventh year, she was appointed Head Girl.
loyalty: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
